channel.title: RuneScape 2001-2002 Registration System
channel.description:
Just curious if anyone happened to have an old picture of how the old registration on the actual client looked like? It might of been from MC135, but I don't recall. Trying to replicate that old client for the fun of it, so if anyone had any pictures or info, would be much appreciated.
EDIT: If I do remember correctly, it also had the option of choosing whether you could be an adventurer, warrior, mage, etc.

item.title: RuneScape 2001-2002 Registration System
item.dc:creator: @zraffz zraffz
item.description:
@zraffz wrote:

warrior got attack def and str as 3 i believe.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 2001-2002 Registration System
item.dc:creator: @Cazbah Cazbah
item.description:
@Cazbah wrote:

Motaro:

Wizard, Archer, Priest, Warrior, & Adventurer were the choices if I remember right.

Miner aswell

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 2001-2002 Registration System
item.dc:creator: @BuyMyJunk BuyMyJunk
item.description:
@BuyMyJunk wrote:

[quote=“DsP, post:4, topic:216957”]Ranger, Wizard, Warrior, Adventurer and possibly Miner.

I don’t have a picture, but if I can remember it was basically like the report abuse window (a black window) with those options.[/quote]

those are the right ones, if you selcted ranger you would get 10 range to start, wizard would be 10 magix to start, warrior i dont know that you got for i forget, adventurer i also forget, and miner you would get 10 mining, all i can remember

and i dont rember any priest option, but i could be wrong

Read full topic
